name: Arcane Training
description: Pick one spell discipline, you can now learn spells from that spell discipline. Additionally you gain 1 [ARCANA] which you can recover by spending 1 [STAMINA] at short rest or during a long rest.

name: Advanced Arcane Training
description: You gain an additional [ARCANA, you can learn one additional spell and you now recover 2 [ARCANA] when you spend 1 [STAMINA] during a short rest.. Additionally for the purposes of meeting the requirements of a Perk your [SPELL LEVEL] is now 1.

name: Caster
description: You gain an additional [ARCANA], pick two Spell Subdisciplines of the same Discipline, you can now also learn spells of those two subdiscipline. Additionally you can learn 2 additional spells and you now recover 3 [ARCANA] when you spend 1 [STAMINA] during a short rest.

name: Versitile Mage
description: Choose one Spell subdiscipline, you can now also learn spells of that discipline. If you take this Perk again the [INT] requirement increases by 2.

name: Elementalist
description:
When you cast a spell of the elemental Discipline you can add 1 to the [SPELL CAST TEST]. Furthermore when you are in a certain Terrain you have an easier time of casting these spells and you can treat your [SPI] Attribute 1 higher for the purpeses of casting this spell.
Elemental Terrain
  • Fire: Grassland, Desert, Vulcano
  • Earth: Hill, Mountain, Underground
  • Water: Ocean, Lakes, Coasts, Underwater, Arctic
  • Air: Forest, in the Air, High Mountain Peaks

name: Pyrmonacer
description:
When you cast a Pyromancy spell, you can reroll one die during the [SPELL CAST TEST].
Additionally at will without any [ARCANA] Cost you can summon a flame for 1 [AP] on a body part that stays there until you extinguish it. This flame can be up to the size of your fist and is hot but doesn’t hurt you. While this flame is burning it can shine a bright light up to 6m and a dim light up to 12m. When you hit someone with an unarmored attack while the flame is present it also deals 1 extra fire damage.

name: Master Pyrmonacer
description:
You can now reroll both dice during the [SPELL CAST TEST] when casting a Pyromancy Spell.

Additionally at will without any [ARCANA] Cost you can change the temperature of water from freezing to boiling at a rate of 1 liter per [AP] spent. You also gain the custom movement Swim(1.5m) and you can use your [SPI] instead of [STR] for Swim Tests.

Additionally for calculating Jump Distance and for any [ATTRIBUTE TEST] related to jumping you can use your [SPI] instead of your [STR] . Additionally when your reaction for Graceful Landing to reduce Fall Damage you can use your Spirit instead of your Agility.

When you cast a Geomancer spell, you can reroll one die during the [SPELL CAST TEST].
Additionally while you are standing on rocky or earthen Terrain you gain tremorsense (6m), if you already have tremorsense it increases by 3m. Further when you make an [ATTRIBUTE TEST] to climb up rock or earth you can use your [SPI] instead of your [STR] .

name: Cosmic Touched
description:
When you cast a spell of the cosmic Discipline you can add 1 to the [SPELL CAST TEST]. Additionally during the day if you cast a light or restoration spell you can treat your [SPI] Attribute 1 higher for the purposes of casting this spell or alternatively during night necromancy and shadow spells are improved.
Additionally you can cast divination spells during your sleep (GM’s determines if that particular spell makes sense) while doing that you can treat your Spirit Attribute 1 higher for the purposes of casting that spell.

description: When you cast a Telekinesis spell, you can reroll one die during the [SPELL CAST TEST]. Additionally at will without an [ARCANA] Cost for 1 [AP] you can now magically move objects weighing up to [SPI] kg up to [SPI/2] meters. You need to see the object and you can't move objects other creatures are holding onto.

name: Telepath
description:
When you cast a Telepathy spell, you can reroll one die during the [SPELL CAST TEST].
Additionally you can telepethically communicate with your mind to a single creature within [SPI] ∗ 10 meters. You can project words, thoughts, ideas and images to that creature and it can reply with basic words.

name: Master Telepath
description:
You can now reroll both dice during the [SPELL CAST TEST] when casting a Telepatthy Spell.
Additionally you are aware of all living creatures within [SPI] ∗ 3 meters, those creatures can’t hide from you unless stated otherwise and don’t gain the benefit of being unseen against you.
